author: Borgarucci, Prospero, fl. 1560-1570
title: De peste perbrevis tractatus. In quo descriptio, causse, signa omnigena, curatio admodum lata, & integra valentium praeservatio, accuratissime preponuntur ... / [Prospero Borgarucci]
imprint: "Venetiis: Ex officina Marci de Maria Salernitani, 1565"
